statements: SELECT property_id, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_status='Approved';
SELECT insured_name, claim_amount, claim_date FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_status='Pending' ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE property_id=1001 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT insured_name, policy_type FROM insurance_claims WHERE property_id=2002 AND claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT claim_id, insured_name, claim_status FROM insurance_claims WHERE policy_type='Home Insurance';
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, claim_amount, claim_status FROM insurance_claims WHERE policy_type = 'Car Insurance' ORDER BY claim_amount ASC;
SELECT insured_name, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT claim_status, COUNT(*) AS total_claims FROM insurance_claims GROUP BY claim_status HAVING total_claims > 5;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE insured_name LIKE '%Smith%' AND (claim_status = 'Pending' OR claim_status = 'Approved');
SELECT * FROM property_insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, property_type, claim_amount FROM property_insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT property_type, risk_score, risk_rating FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_rating = 'High';
SELECT property_type, risk_score, risk_description FROM risk_assessment ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_insurance_claims WHERE property_type = 'Apartment' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT claim_id, property_type, claim_date FROM property_insurance_claims WHERE property_type = 'House' GROUP BY property_type, claim_date ORDER BY claim_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(claim_amount) AS max_claim_amount, MIN(claim_amount) AS min_claim_amount FROM property_insurance_claims WHERE property_type = 'Apartment';
SELECT property_type, AVG(claim_amount) AS avg_claim_amount FROM property_insurance_claims GROUP BY property_type HAVING avg_claim_amount > 3000 ORDER BY avg_claim_amount DESC;

SELECT pc.property_type, ra.risk_rating FROM property_insurance_claims pc INNER JOIN risk_assessment ra ON pc.property_type = ra.property_type WHERE ra.risk_score >= 5 ORDER BY pc.property_type ASC, ra.risk_rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM property_insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM property_insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, property_value, risk_score FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_score > 80;
SELECT MAX(claim_amount) AS max_claim_amount FROM property_insurance_claims;
SELECT analysis_id, strategy_name FROM strategy_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date;
SELECT * FROM strategy_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC, analysis_id ASC
SELECT policy_id, property_value, risk_score FROM risk_assessment WHERE property_value > 100000 ORDER BY property_value DESC
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM property_insurance_claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY claim_amount ASC
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM property_insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT strategy_name FROM strategy_analysis WHERE analysis_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY analysis_id ASC
SELECT * FROM property_insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM property_insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claimants ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT claimant_id, address, phone_number FROM insurance_claimants WHERE claimant_id = 3;
SELECT policy_id, coverage_amount, policy_type FROM insurance_policies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM property_insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, location, claim_amount FROM property_insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claimants WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT pc.policy_id, pc.policy_type, ra.risk_score FROM insurance_policies pc INNER JOIN risk_assessment ra ON pc.policy_id = ra.policy_id;
SELECT name, address FROM insurance_claimants ORDER BY name DESC, address ASC;
SELECT * FROM property_insurance_claims;
SELECT policy_number, policy_holder_name, claim_amount FROM property_insurance_claims WHERE property_type = 'House';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM property_insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT insurance_provider, coverage_amount, premium_amount FROM policy_information WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT address, property_value, construction_material FROM property_details WHERE year_built BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010;
SELECT * FROM property_insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT policy_holder_name, claim_amount FROM property_insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT property_type, claim_amount FROM property_insurance_claims WHERE property_type = 'Apartment' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_information JOIN property_insurance_claims ON policy_information.policy_number = property_insurance_claims.policy_number WHERE coverage_amount > 10000;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM property_insurance_claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
